attributes.action: All online sellers to state country where products are being sold from.
attributes.additional_details: I am an ethical shopper and as such I choose carefully which country the foods I buy come from. Often times, I buy a product registered to be coming from a particular country and once the transaction has been made, I realise the item is coming from somewhere else. This is very duplicitous!
attributes.background: Government should compel all online sellers such as Amazon, eBay etc to state where products being sold are coming from.
